name: Item Shop (oldbomb)
description:
Controls:
Arrowkey + Space
or WASD + E
or Numbad 2468 + Enter
or any combination of the above

[Esc] or [P] pause/menu

debug mode [F2] cheats:
[R] restart
[F] flood fill
[+] / [-] lives
[X] x-ray
[I] +1 more different items in packages

Tested in Firefox, Chrome and Edge.
